name: Xoom Solutions
description:
At Xoom Solutions we are a custom web and mobile app design company. We specialize in web design, web and mobile application development, and targeted online and internet marketing services.

Our services include design & development of Mobile Applications, Custom Websites, E-Commerce Solutions, Cloud Based Services, Enterprise Mobility, ERP Solutions, Managed IT & Infrastructure Solutions, SEO & SEM and Digital Marketing.
As a full service interactive agency we offer a wide range of including web design,  IOS and Android mobile app development,  custom web application development, Magento and Wordpress websites, web marketing, flash animation, e-commerce, and more.
Our major e-commerce projects were developed on Magento, osCommerce/Zen Cart and PrestaShop platforms.
We also provide such services as developing/customizing websites using Wordpress, Drupal and Joomla platforms, as well as creating unique solutions from scratch using one of the PHP/Javascript frameworks like Symfony, CakePHP, Code Igniter, jQuery, etc. Besides web development, we also offer graphic design services by our talented designers.
Our web marketing team delivers best in class search engine optimization (SEO) as well as social media marketing (SMM).
